Title: Relates to the annualization of past-due utility payments after an emergency order is lifted
Summary: Relates to the annualization of past-due utility payments after an emergency order is lifted; requires utility corporations and municipalities provide residential customers with the right to annualize past due payments incurred during an emergency order, minus late fees, in monthly installments not to exceed three months average billing.
LawCode: Amd ยง32, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to the annualization of past-due utility payments after an emergency order is lifted
